She was diagonised with Low sodium Levels & wrng oral medications - Which was the reason for her ill Health.. Doctor helped us with  prescribing the right medications and avoided us with un necesary tablets - which she was having for ages.. Mom recovered well in 3 Days time and was back to Normal.. Very much happy and satisfied with his procedures and are very much thankful to the timely support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am very fortunate to meet you for treatment 
I came for health consultation to you on Friday the 25th October at your consulting room. 
I was not in a position to walkten step without any body help. After you checked me and made me admitted in MGM hospital immediately 
From that time onwards you took care of me so well 
I used to have heavy breathing high blood sugar 
Low blood sugar 
I was completely sick in all respect. 
You made me stand perfectly and get all my health problems corrected. My lungs infection was very bad and poor condition 
You made my lungs in perfect condition with your treatment 
My hemoglobin which was very low with your treatment it was increased and my wight which was 120 kg has been brought to 108 with in two weeks 
Everything was done so nicely with out much pain and suffering 
You made to go for angiography and found out there were three blocks. You put me under Dr A L Narayan for cardiac problems and you along with cardiac department got Angioplasty cleared all blocks 
Today I am in a perfect health condition 
I don't know how to thank you 
You got all my health problems and eradicate all from the roots 
Me and my Family are very obliged to you to do such a wonderful job 
We all pray to God 
This world should have more Doctor and a wonderful person like you 
My almighty give you long healthy life with all happiness 
C P Ganesh
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My mother had few prolonged ailments like acute headache, joint pains, numbness on the hands once after waking up from sleep, sleep deprivation, pigmentation issues on the light exposed areas of her skin. She underwent several treatments over the past few years and nothing turned fruitful. So i wanted to take her for an overall treatment.

I came to know about Dr. Thomas George when I researched about specialists in preventive healthcare/internal medicines. I took my mother for a consultation with him. He did a comprehensive study and started his treatment four months ago. Over these days there is significant improvement in her pigmentation, sleep deprivation and numbness issues. She now has hope that all these ailments can be cured. 

Above all Dr. Thomas George is so caring and friendly. He gets to know the very minute details. He listens to the patients and answers all the queries in a more courteous way. He avoids unnecessary scans/tests/medicines and knows exactly what he is doing. I am happy that I took my mother to the right medical practitioner
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation

review:
Dr. Thomas George came in form of God and helped my father T A DEVARAJAN to recover from Covid. 
The word 'GOD' I had used is less to describe the amount of help he had provided to my family in time of crisis.

We were roaming hospitals taking father to admit but seeing the exorbitant rates we were clueless what to do. 
My sister in law Booma gave me the reference and she had contacted Dr Thomas George he helped us immediately and my father was admitted in the hospital. 

Dr Thomas George is a great doctor. He ensured my fathers health status and provided him personal care by constantly checking with him. Also he put my father under good medication and so that my father recovered soon and he was discharged soon. 
We were charged very reasonable by the hospital too. 
I am tremendously happy that my father recovered under his guidance

Also I am happy that I have a found a good doctor for my family and I will suggest him to all my extended family and friends. 

Thanks a zillion sirüôèüôè. 

I pray to God to give you and your family lots of happiness and good healthüòäüòä
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My son was first admitted for dengue and Dr. Thomas George was the phisician and his approach and enlightening about the status and caring is really remarkable and his team of assistants and nursing care at Fortis is Great and wish that they excell further and further.
Right from access and entry to exit Hospitality in Fortis Hospital has merged to it
Great corporate approach üëå MOD and security screening of made bit user-friendly would be great
Hats off to Thomas George sir his kind services and on-call at any point of time he is approached.

Subsequent to my son's discharge my daughter also got high fever and we have been bit worried and local physician care and known sources were not that responsive but when I contacted Dr. Thomas George despite he was in rounds ( that too at the Chennai floods tme at peak now 10th Nov 2021) he called back and pacified and immediately supported in all means with one Mr. Vimal Raj in MOD introduction.

It was a great support by Mr. Vimal and team  at such critical phase (during floods) and 5 days of hospitalisation and what MOD experience we had earlier fully rectified and
For FORTIS AND TEAM our wishes and keep up this service ever and ever .

Thank you all for a great SERVICE with SMILE and HOSPITALity

Regards
O. R. Murugadass
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation. Dr ATG

tags: Wait time,
review:
I had severe chest pain and shortness of breath. I was diagnosed with pneumonia almost immediately and I am very thankful to Dr.Thomas and his team for getting me healthy in just 4 days time. He was very clear about the treatment route and kept me well aware of the cost factor so I can take informed decisions. 
I am very glad I was put under his jurisdiction in the emergency ward.

PS I ONLY CHOSE WAIT TIME COZ THE APP DID NOT ALLOW ME TO SUBMIT UNLESS I CHOSE AN OPTION FOR THR PREVIOUS QUESTION

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. A. Thomas George, Senior Medical consultant and Diabetologia t is our family redeemer and saviour. He was introduced by my chithappa (Uncle) Dr.Arasumohan in the year 1991-92 at Vijaya Hospital, Vadapalani.
When my elder sister S. Shanmuga Priya was admitted for treatment of epilepsy and problem in her brain who often fall down with a sickness of unbearable fits when she was at schooling at Chennai.
Our Doctor Thomas George  had administered and given treatment for a year. She had taken medicines and tablets as prescribed by doctor continuously without any break of single day. With the wonderful treatment of our doctor, she was totally relieved from above mentioned sickness of epilepsy and brain issues. My sister studied BE(CS) and MBA(HR) after treatment by our doctor and living a healthy life since then. our family is associated with 2.5decades.
Recently I approached our Doctor at Fortis, Vadapalani for treatment of unbearable headache (migraine) loss of appetite and body weekness. This problem existed for more than two years. Dr.ATG checked my health and administered and given medicines for two months and I feel totally relieved from all my health issues. I'm able to concentrate at work now. Because of the treatment given by our beloved Doctor , Thomas George , our family worship him as our saviour and redeemer forever.
All our family member pray to God to shower His blessings on Dr.Thomas George to have a LONG LIFE Coupled with good health to render treatment for needy patients from all over the world.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation and prayers

review: I have to start by saying that Dr. Thomas George is simply great. I have been struggling with shortness of breath/breathlessness for around 2 years now. I had approached different specialists at top hospitals only to have them invalidate my experience. Every doctor i went to told me that my bloodwork was fine and i was just imagining it and made me give up on seeking treatment. After seeing amazing reviews for Dr Thomas George, i decided to have a consultation. He made me take only necessary tests and gave prompt accurate diagnosis. After 2 long years of struggle i was able to breath with ease, all thanks to Dr Thomas George. He is very approachable. There have been situations where I'd text him in whatsapp and he makes the time to respond back to my querries. Such a friendly doctor. Down to earth person. I'd 100% recommend him to everyone i know because im absolutely certain that  people are in the safest of hands if they choose Dr. Thomas George.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I have known Dr. A. Thomas George for more than a decade. Recently, when I tested my creatinine levels in one of the local labs it was very much on the higher side. So, I was worried and visited Dr. A. Thomas George in the Fortis hospital. He went through the report and quickly commented that something was wrong with the report. 
As he wanted to conduct a detailed investigation, I was admitted in the hospital and I had undergone all the major tests recommended by him. At the end after him studying all the reports he had conclusively confirmed to me that my kidneys are in good health. He found that some of the medicines that I had been taking had caused the variations and gave me a new set of medicines. I‚Äôm really happy with the way Dr. George had conducted the diagnosis. Dr. A. Thomas George was very understanding, explicit in his diagnosis and took great effort to make me understand and explained to me in detail. I am really thankful to him for taking care of me.

tags: Wait time,
review: My appointment time 8.30 am, I reached 8.15, when hospital closed. No body is there, except security, 9.30 am I called doctor, he told sorry, then he came 10.30 am, two hours late, the doctor George not ready to hear my problem, never given chance to explain, he asked regular question like yes or no type. Totally I'm disappointed.
reply_text:
Hello Mr Selvam , 
    Hope you are aware that Covid 19 lockdown period is still on .1) During this period, some of our poor dedicated staff have to come from far of places, some from even containment zones. Hence they will not be able to come on time not forgetting the fact that their children have to taken care at home during this period   2)All your medical complaints were heard and documented in the letter head  3) You were also examined adequately , which most doctors fail to do during this COVID period 4) The examination findings have been written and documented in the letter head 5) Your medical condition was explained to you more than adequately for almost more than 15 mins- 6) We doctors have certain protocols to be followed during this COVID pandemic period to safeguard your health my health and our healthcare workers health.  It‚Äôs time for patients to understand the plight of the Doctors and healthcare worker. Even when all are scared and taking shelter in their home, we are in the frontline to serve the community. I don‚Äôt think I need to explain more. One has to be more understanding in such situations. Dr Thomas George

review:
I m Meenakshi Visited Fortis vadapalani and chennai medical centre  as an outpatient several times to meet Dr. Thomas George. I m taking treatment with him for the past 30 years.  He is very polite friendly approachable physician.  Very courteous.  While examining itself he will  diagnosis the ailment and he will supplement with test results.  Whatever he diagnosed will be in the reports.  More than a doctor he is my well wisher.  He supported me in my health issues like a brother. He will treat the patient very personally.
Thank you very much sir.  I always pray for his long and healthy life.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: seeing the reviews I visited the doctor, he spoke to me very well in the phone for appointment, after travelling all the way he never bothered to say hi, anyway not a issue. he examined my mom and told me to take test for about rs. 15000. Also he insisted to take in a particular lab, eventhoug I explained to take the test nearby to my place. I feel this approach is not adorable. I felt not to visit him again. also he was in hurry to leave somewhere. for the man of his age and experience, this act made me disappointed.  I will not recommend this doctor.
reply_text:
Hello , 
   Noted your grievances., I wish to give my explanation 
1) I did not say ‚ÄòHi ‚Äò to welcome you ..... please understand that  with my N95 Mask on , you could not have seen my pleasant smile nor you have heard my ‚Äò hello ‚Äò
2) Your mother had a Very long list of 8 or 9 complaints which includes severe pain in the Neck with severe restriction of movement, giddiness and reeling sensation, retrosternal chest discomfort, difficulty in walking etc since 7 months 
3) Her Bp was 170 / 110 
4) All her complaints and my clinical findings have been Documented in my assessment sheet which I have and will be shared to Practo
4) You also had 2 or 3 files of treatment details which had not given her relief. Hence it is my duty and responsibility with my 40 yrs of my medical experience to give you the correct diagnosis 
5) when you are not able to find a diagnosis for 7 months, you can‚Äôt expect me to give you a complete diagnosis in 20 mins time without appropriate investigations 
6) It is  a BLATANT LIE to state that you told me that you would get your tests done in a place close to your house.
7) yes, I love to save lives of critically ill patients and hence I am busy. I greatly appreciate that you did not accuse that I am lazy.!
Anyways, as a Senior citizen and and a doctor, that‚Äôs all I can do... 
this is the only explanation I can give. Wish your mother a speedy recovery. Dr ATG

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was suffering from hypertension during 2000 and started loosing weight. I consulted several doctors and everybody was treating me for high BP and the problem never subsided. One day,a friend of mine advised me to consult him.  He diagnoised me for hypetthyroidism which was found to be true after blood test. He prescribed me medicines accordingly and I was fully recovered. I was in a transferable job and had very brief association with him. I am since settled in Karnataka and still remember him even after 20 years for curing my illness and giving new lease of life.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your appreciation. I hope that you are doing well. It indeed gives me so much of happiness and joy when I read it ,making my 40 years of medical experience so fruitful. Thank you once again.
